sentence.Network_en: As a boy he was a Manchester United fan.

sentence.Network_en: The boy first showed promise as an athlete in grade school.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个男孩在上小学的时候就初次显示出成为运动员的潜力。

sentence.Network_en: At their approach the little boy scurried away and hid.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们走近时，小男孩急忙跑开藏了起来。

jx.jx_en_mean: used to express the view that mischievous or childish behaviour is typical of boys or young men and should not cause surprise when it occurs
jx.jx_cn_mean: 孩子总是孩子嘛！（意为男孩子难免要淘气，不足为怪）

jx.jx_en_mean: men or organizations considered to be the most powerful and successful

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English  (denoting a male servant): of unknown origin

encyclopedia.content: 基本信息 歌曲名称：Boy 演唱歌手：程晨 发行公司：华艺天鑫 发行时间：2011年11月11日 专辑语种：国语 歌曲简介 《Boy》 词/曲：程晨 演唱：程晨 程晨携第二波“正能量”单曲《Boy》再袭单身之夜 歌曲歌词 夜空 未眠 飘荡着思念 月光 浮现 浪漫的画面 午夜的街头 空荡的路口 漂泊的执着 何时能停留 冰冷的双手 漫长的等候 相信你也一样在等我 I want a boy like a man 给我单纯的爱还要能让我依赖 对我说爱用心爱世界会变温暖 时

entry.def: A boy is a child who will grow up to be a man.

example.ex: I knew him when he was a little boy...
example.tran: 他还是个小男孩的时候我就认识他了。

example.ex: He was still just a boy.

entry.tran: 男青年，小伙子（尤用于指青年男女恋爱关系时）
entry.def: You can refer to a young man as a boy, especially when talking about relationships between boys and girls.

example.ex: ...the age when girls get interested in boys.
example.tran: 姑娘开始对小伙子感兴趣的年龄

example.ex: Eric was my cousin Edward's boy...
example.tran: 埃里克是我表兄爱德华的儿子。

entry.tran: 家伙，伙计（尤用于亲切谈论某人时）
entry.def: You can refer to a man as a boy, especially when you are talking about him in an affectionate way.

example.tran: 当上总统的本地小伙子

example.ex: 'Come on boys', he shouted to the sailors.
example.tran: “加把劲儿，伙计们”，他向船员们喊道。

entry.tran: 家伙，伙计（用于吆喝马或狗时）
entry.def: You can use boy when giving instructions to a horse or dog.
The police are sometimes referred to as the boys in blue .

entry.tran: 好家伙(表示激动、羡慕等情感）
entry.def: Some people say 'boy' or 'oh boy' in order to express feelings of excitement or admiration.

example.ex: Oh Boy! Just think what I could tell him.
example.tran: 哇，好家伙！想想看我会告诉他什么。

entry.tran: 男人总归是男人（用以表示男人的典型行为不会改变）
entry.def: If you say boys will be boys, for example when a group of men are behaving noisily or aggressively, you are suggesting in a light-hearted way that this is typical male behaviour and will never change.
If a man is described as one of the boys, he is accepted by a group of male friends who do things that are thought of as typically masculine.

example.ex: He wants to be accepted as one of the boys.
example.tran: 他想被人看作一个男子汉。

sentences.sentence: "she made the boy brush his teeth every night"
"most soldiers are only boys in uniform"

means.word_mean: 2. a friendly informal reference to a grown man;

sentences.sentence: "he likes to play golf with the boys"
"his boy is taller than he is"

means.word_mean: 4. (ethnic slur) offensive term for Black man;

auth_sentence.res_content: Local boy So what's behind Janesville's renaissance?

auth_sentence.res_content: Yet Tedder's vocals are pure boy band pop.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yet Tedder's vocals are pure boy band pop.

auth_sentence.content: The boy is simply, fabulously and stunningly talented.
auth_sentence.res_content: The boy is simply, fabulously and stunningly talented.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The boy is simply, fabulously and stunningly talented.

Sentence.sentence: Children also learn to behave as boys or girls through observation and imitation.
They encounter boys all the time socially out of school, and through debating societies and things like that, some school activities as well.
The youngish-looking man takes his little boy to the hermitage frequently so that when he grows up he will know what is essential

sentences.en: These boys insulted a girl by spitting at her.
sentences.cn: 这几个男孩向一个女孩吐口水侮辱她。

jushi.english: His boy brushed the dust of his hat.
jushi.chinese: 他的儿子刷去了帽子上的灰。

jushi.english: The little boy alternated playing and studying.
jushi.chinese: 这个小男孩玩一会儿学一会儿。

jushi.english: For a year after her boy left her,Grace missed him so badly that she almost pined away to nothing.
jushi.chinese: 自从她的男朋友离开她以后,一年来,格蕾斯想他想得都瘦成一把骨头了。
